ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards
ygData.msgSnippet: I try not to use fear as a crowd control mechanism.  That does freak people out.  I haven t had much trouble with charm though.  Every time I do it, people go,
ygData.messageBody:
I try not to use fear as a crowd control mechanism. That does freak people
out. I haven't had much trouble with charm though. Every time I do it,
people go, "Wow, that's cool. He does a lot more damage than you do." I
think that's a compliment?

I used to use Lullaby all the time just the way an enchanter uses AoE mez.
I couldn't buff, or heal, or anything else while mezzing, but that was okay.
The way Lullaby is now though don't bother it will just get you killed.

Lament is something I need to play with a bit more. I put it away in SolA
because the goblins never had it work on them. I need to try it on some
Kunark mobs and see if it works on them or is just generally broken like
Lullaby.

Kitasi

I've got 2 questions about Crowd control and lament pulling.

On crowd control, how do you get a group to let you do it? Every time
I try charm, mez or selective fear someone (often more than one) freaks
out.
